metadata.title: CVE-2023-6489 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability was identified in GitLab CE/EE, versions16.7.7 prior to 16.8.6, 16.9 prior to 16.9.4 and 16.10 prior to 16.10.2which allows an attacker to spike the GitLab instance resources usageresulting in service degradation via chat integration feature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
